        Returns:

      • getFingerprint

        static int getFingerprint(Method[] methods)
        Get the hash code of an array of methods Methods are sorted before hashcode is calculated. So the returned value is irrelevant of the method order in the array.
        Parameters:
        methods - an array of methods
        Returns:
        the hash code

      • getFingerprint

        static int getFingerprint(int[] hashcodes)
        Get the hash code of an array of hashcodes Hashcodes are sorted before hashcode is calculated. So the returned value is irrelevant of the hashcode order in the array.
        Parameters:
        methods - an array of methods
        Returns:
        the hash code
